<!-- 
Updating the bib:
    - must update by hand the file publicationsCVclean.bib in mybib repo
    - once updated, below code downloads current version and loads into R
    - must reference relevant article in relevant pane (publications or presentations)
Afterwards, update the following:
    - Your CV
    - Research Gate
    - Academia EDU
    - Google scholar
-->



```{r, eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE, cache=FALSE}
library(RefManageR)

fileUrl <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jvcasillas/mybib/master/publicationsCVclean.bib"
download.file(fileUrl, destfile = "./site_libs/assets/bib/publicationsCVclean.bib", method = "curl")
# list.files("./data")


bib <- ReadBib("./site_libs/assets/bib/publicationsCVclean.bib", check = FALSE)
```
